div.p: I think that was when I was feeling really down about a year ago and thinking I’m stuck in a dead-end job, nowhere to progress and just
you know it just made me feel that it’s now or never and I think, you know, when you feel that low sometimes it is good although it doesn’t feel like it
at the time but it does give you that kick up the bum that you really need to get on and do something that you do want to do.
I do slightly regret not going to Uni but if I did go to Uni I wouldn’t have what I’ve got now which is my own house, my own business, my own car
I’d probably be in loads of debt and starting from scratch again trying to find a job so it’s like, you know, but I have missed that opportunity
of going to Uni and I will never know if I would have made it as a performer now
